item.title: JavaScript Lint compilation
item.description: JavaScript Lint allows you to validate JavaScript files from command line. For Windows and Mac OS Boxex we can download precompiled binaries . I donâ€™t know why authors missed part in documentation which describes how to compile this under Linux box. Here is missing interaction: wget http://www.javascriptlint.com/download/jsl-0.3.0-src.tar.gz tar zxvf jsl-0.3.0-src.tar.gz cd jsl-0.3.0/src/ make -f Makefile.ref sudo cp Linux_All_DBG.OBJ/jsl /usr/local/bin
